home.title: Save, protect the environment, live WasteFree!
home.desc: An innovative platform for waste management and resource optimization. Join the ecological revolution!
home.supportedCities.title: Where WasteFree already works
home.supportedCities.lead: We cooperate with people, who want to make environment clean!
home.supportedCities.cityTagline: Be part of the zero-waste movement right where you live.
home.supportedCities.empty: We are just getting started – new cities are joining soon!
home.supportedCities.error: We could not load supported cities right now. Please try again later.
features.stat.title: Statistics & reports
features.stat.desc: Analyze your consumption, generate reports and track progress in waste reduction.
features.community.title: Community
features.community.desc: Collaborate with other users, share ideas and achievements.
features.suggestions.title: Smart suggestions
features.suggestions.desc: Receive personalized tips on how to reduce waste and save resources.

auth.address.streetNumberRequired: Include a house number in the address.
auth.account.created.title: Account created!
auth.account.created.desc: An activation link will be sent to the provided email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate the account.
auth.account.activated.title: Account activated
auth.account.activated.success: Your account has been activated. You can now log in.
auth.account.activated.error: We couldn't activate your account. Please check the activation link or contact support.
auth.account.activated.badLink: The activation link is invalid or expired. Please request a new activation email.

inbox.title: Notifications
portal.home.lead: This is your dashboard – a quick overview of balance, recent activity and notifications.
pickupOrder.title: Order a waste pickup
pickupOrder.subtitle: Choose the service that best fits your pickup.
pickupOrder.step.orderType.lead: Select the pickup scenario that matches your needs. You will refine the request in the next steps.
pickupOrder.step.participants.title: Participants
pickupOrder.step.participants.lead: Add the people involved in this pickup so everyone knows their role.
pickupOrder.step.participants.placeholde: This section is coming soon - you will soon add participants here.
pickupOrder.step.participants.groupsLead: Choose the group that is submitting this pickup order.
pickupOrder.step.participants.usersLead: Select the members who will take part in this pickup.
pickupOrder.step.participants.empty: You are not part of any garbage groups yet.
pickupOrder.step.participants.noGroupSel: Select a group to see its members.
pickupOrder.step.participants.noUsers: This group has no available members yet.
pickupOrder.step.participants.allPending: All members are awaiting approval. You cannot add participants yet.
pickupOrder.step.address.title: Address & date
pickupOrder.step.address.lead: Provide the location and preferred date for the service.
pickupOrder.step.address.placeholder: You will soon be able to pick the exact address and date.
pickupOrder.step.address.selectedGroupLe: We will handle the pickup at this group location.
pickupOrder.step.address.noGroup: Select a group in the previous step to review its address.
pickupOrder.step.address.scheduleLead: Pick when we should arrive. We will confirm the schedule with you.
pickupOrder.step.address.dropOffDateHint: Select the day we should drop off the container.
pickupOrder.step.address.dropOffTimeHint: Pick the hour for container delivery.
pickupOrder.step.address.dateHint: Choose a day that works for your group.
pickupOrder.step.address.timeHint: Select the hour we should arrive.
pickupOrder.options.small.title: Small pickup
pickupOrder.options.small.description: Ideal for a few bags or light waste. Quick visit with a small truck.
pickupOrder.options.regular.title: Regular pickup
pickupOrder.options.regular.description: Perfect for standard clean-ups or medium amounts of waste.
pickupOrder.options.container.title: Container drop-off & pickup
pickupOrder.options.container.descriptio: We deliver a container, you fill it, and we collect it on the date you choose.
pickupOrder.options.special.title: Custom / special order
pickupOrder.options.special.description: Unique situation? Start a tailored flow and we will handle the rest.
pickupOrder.validation.serviceType: Choose a pickup type to continue.
pickupOrder.validation.containerSize: Select a container size to continue.
pickupOrder.step.details.title: Pickup details
pickupOrder.step.details.lead: Optionally flag this pickup as high priority or request help with carrying waste.
pickupOrder.step.details.placeholder: Configure additional services like priority handling or collecting assistance.
pickupOrder.step.details.container.label: Container size
pickupOrder.step.details.container.descr: Choose the container capacity for this pickup.
pickupOrder.step.details.priority.label: High priority
pickupOrder.step.details.priority.descri: Mark the order when the crew should arrive as soon as possible.
pickupOrder.step.details.collecting.desc: Ask the team to help carry and load the waste.
pickupOrder.summary.cost.title: Service cost
pickupOrder.summary.cost.error: We couldn't calculate the cost. Try again later.
pickupOrder.summary.cost.missing: Provide the pickup schedule and options to preview the cost.
pickupOrder.summary.cost.specialOrder: Service cost is agreed individually for special orders.
pickupOrder.summary.cost.note: Final utilization fee will be added after waste processing.
pickupOrder.step.summary.title: Summary
pickupOrder.step.summary.lead: Review all data before sending your request.
pickupOrder.step.summary.placeholder: You will soon see a full summary of your order here.
pickupOrder.summary.noGroup: Select a group to review its details.
pickupOrder.summary.incompleteHint: Complete all previous steps to view the summary.
pickupOrder.summary.incomplete: Complete all steps before submitting the order.
pickupOrder.summary.genericError: We could not submit the order. Try again in a moment.
pickupOrder.summary.submitError: We could not submit the order. Try again in a moment.
